creator: jplejacq@quoininc.com
text:
Tomcat supports running multiple instances from a single installation.  This is
a nice feature to support multiple developers on a single computer.

Unfortunately, the Lenya build process assumes only a single tomcat instance per
installation.

I've attached a patch to the Lenya head that removes this assumption.

Created attachment 11310
Patch to Lenya HEAD to support multiple tomcat instances
creator: jplejacq@quoininc.com
